text: NEWPORT LIGHTS HEAVY UP PROGRESS REPORT
Distribution allowance was very effective in accomplishing our objectives. All accounts have purchased introductory products.
Eagle Foods is the only Void.
Reception from these accounts is most positive with a solid incentitive to purchase.
EFFECTIVENESS OF THE RETAIL (1 00 OFF CARTON) DISTRIBUTION ALLOWANCE:
Has been most helpful in acquiring desireable distribution when needed by Sales Reps.
The 40c off promotions continue to be well received at the retail stores and by consumers, as well.
